sqlMap.update: UPDATE PLACEMENU SET HOST = #host#, FILEPATH = #filePath# , MTYPE = #mType# WHERE MNID = #mnid#
UPDATE PLACEMENU SET TITLE = #title#, CONTENT = #content#, PRICE = #price#, ISSALE = #isSale#, SALEPRICE = #salePrice#, SORT = ##sort## WHERE MNID = #mnid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT sql_calc_found_rows C.MNID, C.FID, C.TITLE, C.CONTENT, C.PRICE, C.ISSALE, C.SALEPRICE, I.BASNAME AS HOST, C.FILEPATH, C.MTYPE FROM PLACE A INNER JOIN PLACEMENU C ON A.FID = C.FID LEFT OUTER JOIN PBASCD I ON A.IMAGEHOST = I.BASECD AND I.GRPCD = 'MEDIA' AND I.BASEKEY = 'IMAGEHOST' WHERE A.FID = #fid#
ORDER BY C.SORT LIMIT #startRow# , #endRow#
